events.message: I received my order yesterday but I want to request a refund because the product does not meet my expectations.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's message mentioning a refund.
An agent has been assigned to the case to handle the refund request promptly.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I’m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason why you are requesting a refund?
My order number is 123456789. The product didn’t match the description on your website, so I would like my money back.
We can initiate the refund process immediately. Please confirm if you have already shipped the product back to us or if you need a return label.
Thank you, I haven’t sent the product back yet. Please send me a return label to my email.
I’ve sent the return shipping label to your email. Once we receive the product, we will process your refund within 5 business days.
Got the label, thank you! I will ship the product back today and look forward to the refund.
We have received the returned product and processed your refund. The amount should reflect on your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to make sure you received your refund and that everything is resolved to your satisfaction.
Yes, I received the refund. Thank you for your quick and helpful support!
Closing this case as the refund process has been completed and the customer confirmed satisfaction.
